channel.title: Aranoth [Play Beta NOW!]
channel.description:
[center]http://prntscr.com/mns2h[/center] http://aranoth.no-ip.org/ [left][u]UPDATED[/u][/left] [center]BETA IS [u]ONLINE[/u][/center] [center]i got tired of runescape and runescape private Severs,[/center] [center]So i made my OWN MMO game[/center] [center]i dont own this game, im just part of the devoloment team[/center] [center]We haven't realeased yet, but i will keep you updated[/center]
[center]MERRRRRRYYYY CHRISTMAS!!!!!![/center] [center]come play now, and do the new holiday event, you get a soon to be rare item![/center] [center]http://prntscr.com/mxikv[/center] [center]playing wearing rare item on head^[/center]
Features ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~we have added a few skills ~woodcutting ~mining ~magic ~fishing we are working on a few more more features~~~~~~~~~~~~~ pk area added the first boss added a Christmas quest for Christmas working on items and spells to add to the game when we realease also adding TONS of more skills, all skills go to 1-99 max combat level is 100 ~~~~ we will still be in beta testing when we realease~~~ we WILL need beta testers, message me at SavionPortz@gmail.com if interested. i will keep you all imformed if you would like to join this game when its realeased ~~~~~we plan to realease sometime this Chritmas Season~~~~~ pics :D updated pics and client ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ http://prntscr.com/mrguj http://prntscr.com/mrgvs http://prntscr.com/mrgyr http://prntscr.com/mrh2o Boss ~~~~ http://prntscr.com/mxiua WEBSITE AND DOWNLOAD (norton picks it up as a virus for some reason, but there is none, its ok if you dont turst the game, were fixing it as we speak ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ http://aranothonline.webs.com/ http://www.mediafire.com/?fw263z6bma2s8vh Tell me some feedback, always good to hear (mods please don delete this, im new to posting idk some of the ruless) ~~~~i do not own this game, im just part of the devoplement team~~~~~~ this is not up 24/7 atm ~Savy

item.title: Aranoth [Play Beta NOW!]
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“RS PS, post:9, topic:474649”]Oh god, Not one good luck comment. What is wrong with people, this is partly the reason people quit developments and he is trying to make something that is different from runescape but it doesn’t mean he cannot use ideas. So many people here cry for difference but when someone makes something different, you always find a tiny flaw to cause an argument.

OT: Looks good.

Good Luck.[/quote]

Sometimes different is bad, like in this case. Right now it looks like Runescape with worse graphics and different controls.

Read full topic

item.title: Aranoth [Play Beta NOW!]

What is wrong with people, this is partly the reason people quit developments and he is trying to make something that is different from runescape but it doesn’t mean he cannot use ideas. So many people here cry for difference but when someone makes something different, you always find a tiny flaw to cause an argument.

Good Luck.

item.title: Aranoth [Play Beta NOW!]
item.dc:creator: @Savy2007 Savy2007
item.description:
@Savy2007 wrote:

ya, its based off of rs, but were not trying to copy it it completely. Thanks for your feedback, those pictures i posted arn’t up to date, we’ve added a few updates with graphics, items, and skills[quote=“Si Force, post:6, topic:474649”]No offence, but it sounds like you’re all just trying to recreate RuneScape… All of your features resemble RS ones in some way or another, why not get creative and make original content?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Aranoth [Play Beta NOW!]
item.dc:creator: @Savy2007 Savy2007
item.description:
@Savy2007 wrote:

ya, the graphics engine is the same, but we are working on a HD client, and were working on , spec attacks, better animations, and more skills as we speak, im not sure what format its in, ill have to ask the owner, i think he made a custom format.

Read full topic

item.title: Aranoth [Play Beta NOW!]
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“Savy2007, post:3, topic:474649”]the owner redid all of the orginal format of the rpg maker, we’ve added a skill system and a weapon system that wasn’t part of the engine. everthing we peactially rebuilt the wholee engine[/quote]But in what programming language?

EDIT:From the pictures it looks exactly like eclipse origins.
http://www.touchofdeathforums.com/community/index.php?/topic/104386-eclipse-origins-v2-beta/

Read full topic

item.title: Aranoth [Play Beta NOW!]
item.dc:creator: @Savy2007 Savy2007
item.description:
@Savy2007 wrote:

the owner redid all of the orginal format of the rpg maker, we’ve added a skill system and a weapon system that wasn’t part of the engine. everthing we peactially rebuilt the wholee engine. The the engine also didnt come with skills, so we had to add them, and we made the quest system by ourselfs, and there and we made an installer for the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Aranoth [Play Beta NOW!]

item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

Yay for VB. Would actually be impressive if you weren’t using RPGMaker or whatever it is nowadays.

[center]http://prntscr.com/mns2h[/center]
http://aranoth.no-ip.org/
[left]UPDATED[/left]
[center]BETA IS ONLINE[/center]
[center]i got tired of runescape and runescape private Severs,[/center]
[center]So i made my OWN MMO game[/center]
[center]i dont own this game, im just part of the devoloment team[/center]

[center]MERRRRRRYYYY CHRISTMAS!!![/center]

Features

~we have added a few skills
~woodcutting
~mining
~magic
~fishing
we are working on a few more
more features~~~~~~~~~~~~~
pk area
added the first boss
added a Christmas quest for Christmas
working on items and spells to add to the game when we realease
also adding TONS of more skills, all skills go to 1-99
max combat level is 100
~~~~ we will still be in beta testing when we realease~~~
we WILL need beta testers, message me at SavionPortz@gmail.com if interested.
i will keep you all imformed if you would like to join this game when its realeased
~~~~~we plan to realease sometime this Chritmas Season~~~~~
